title: Is the iPhone 5s worth buying in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: The 5S can no longer get OS updates. You may have incompatibility problems with some apps. I had a 5S recently, and you can probably still use mail, messaging, browsing and YouTube. The compact size and flat edges feels great in your hand. Screen size is a little bit too small. I prefer the screen size of the latest iPhone SE 2020.
The new SE is so cheap at 399 you’d probably want to get it wouldn’t you?
